thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
As I spend a lot of time travelling, it was very helpful to be able to get tyres on the drive to replace two tyres whilst I had a day at home.
I had enquired about tyre replacement at a high street chain , but they said I would have to come to site and will probably have to wait.
I don't have the time to wait so tyres on the drive were perfect. Tyres changed while I worked. Easy
